book: 2950-Fre Cleanse Me Foaming Micellar Cleanser & Makeup Remover

chunk: Directions: Generously pump foaming cleanser into hands. Gently massage onto wet skin and then rinse off. This product can be used on facial skin and on lips. To remove eye makeup, add a small amount of product to a cotton or reusable pad and gently wipe closed eyes. Avoid the delicate eye area. For best results, use twice a day.
book: 2950-Fre Cleanse Me Foaming Micellar Cleanser & Makeup Remover

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
